def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Improved version of `modify_features_v1`.

    Thought 1: The deviation of weight from the average weight on each side could reveal more about the balance scale.
    New Feature 10: left_weight_deviation | left_weight_deviation = abs(Left-Weight - np.mean(df_input['Left-Weight']))
    New Feature 11: right_weight_deviation | right_weight_deviation = abs(Right-Weight - np.mean(df_input['Right-Weight']))

    Thought 2: The residual value after comparing distances on each side might provide additional information.
    New Feature 12: distance_residual | distance_residual = df_input['Left-Distance'] - df_input['Right-Distance']
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()

    # Feature: Deviation of weight from the average weight on each side
    df_output['left_weight_deviation'] = np.abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - np.mean(df_input['Left-Weight']))
